Global India Insurance Brokers (GIIB) welcomes and opens furry of opportunities to our partners and customers with its flexible, transparent and technology led environment and approach. At GIIB we believe in long term association with the clients not only in words but through our actions as well. Your quest ends here at GIIB if you are looking towards joining hands with a trust worthy, young yet mature and ethical organization. GIIB holds its distinction among several players in market through its commitment towards gifting the industry a unique approach of doing business with no compromise on regulatory compliance, support to its partners and services to end customers.\n\nLicensed in October 2015, GIIB has been given opportunity to be able to provide services in all segments of insurance business. Team of GIIB is all but novice in terms of handling multiple lines of business be it retail or corporate. To its credit, GIIB has rich industry interface and close associations with all insurers present in country.

GIIB has been founded by a group of stalwarts of the insurance industry and people with acumen of technology and operations. We believe in `Staying Ahead` of Competition/ with oursheer hunger for infusing innovation in business and creating a niche among masses...
